directions: In large bowl, with electric mixer at medium speed, beat sugar and butter until creamy. Add cider and eggs, beat until smooth. At low speed gradually blend flour, cinnamon, baking soda and salt. Stir in apples and nuts. Drop by spoonful 2 inches apart onto greased bakery sheet.
Bake 375Â°F for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from sheet. Cool on wire rack.
title: Apple Pie Cookies
